name: Lava Run (Banquet Games, fornclake, TheRetroDragon)
description:
NOTICE: Some users were not able to load the game if their AdBlock was enabled. I am looking into it, but if your game has an error, please try disabling AdBlock!

Can you outrun the relentless heat? Attempt to escape the encroaching lava and get a high score in this action packed platformer. Traverse the volcano with wall jumps and slides as you narrowly escape the dark cavern.

Tap the button in the lower-right corner of the menu to enable mobile controls.

Made with Godot Engine.
